review: Very glitch. constantly stoping and restarting. Returned.
author: Todd Quattlander

review: Love it!  Easy to set up and use. There is lots of content to choose from, and everything really does load fast. I did find it was easier to load my watch list on the web site than from the Fire TV Stick itself. Can't wait to try it with Netflix content too. It will be nice to have all my streaming media in one place.
author: ALV

review: Easy to hookup, easy to setup. I was watching a movie within 5 min.
author: Thomas C.

review: Very happy with this purchase. Setup was very easy and easy to use. Very convenient for my older relatives it was purchased for.
author: Klint
